name: Path of Gluttony
description: Sacrifice health to dash again. Corrupt boons on enemies struck.

name: Bullet Catcher

facts.description: Blocks incoming attacks. Empowers Defiant Roar with each blocked attack, up to 3 stacks.

description: Focus your mind on the battle, blocking incoming attacks. After activating this skill, Defiant Roar becomes available for a short duration. Blocking attacks empowers Defiant Roar.

name: Enervation Blade
description: Chain. Fire a wide piercing projectile from your blade. Heal if a target is struck. Healing is reduced for each target beyond the first.

name: Symbol of Ignition

facts.description: Deals damage every second; stacks intensity.
Increased outgoing damage; stacks intensity.

description: Symbol. Create a symbol that ignites when you strike an enemy inside it or shoot a projectile into it, damaging and burning enemies inside it. If the symbol is ignited by a projectile, it enchants that projectile to burn its target.

name: Molten Meteor
description:
Dual Attack. Bombard your foe with a meteor that inflicts multiple conditions.

If you have a fire bullet, consume it to cause the shot to explode when it strikes an enemy, damaging other foes in the blast. If you have an earth bullet, consume it to inflict additional bleeding.

name: Devouring Visage

facts.description: Involuntary retreat; unable to act; stacks duration.

description: Fire an orb of death magic that explodes on impact, inflicting fear on enemies. Gain life force for each target struck. Reactivate this skill to drain the strength of all enemies struck by the explosion.

name: Flourish

facts.description: Gain health every second; stacks duration.
Imbued with vital energy. At 5 stacks you become a Force of Nature, growing enlarged, gaining stability, increasing your outgoing damage and healing, and recharging your mace skills.
Increased outgoing damage and healing.

description: Strike the earth, damaging nearby enemies and healing nearby allies. The ground flourishes in response, repeating stronger effects after a delay. Gain Nature's Strength if the initial strike hits an enemy.

name: Reverse Strike
description: Chain. A follow-up reverse-handed staff strike.

name: Valiant Leap

facts.description: Increased outgoing damage; stacks intensity.
Critical chance increased; stacks duration.

description: Leap to the targeted location, empowering allies and damaging enemies. Gain adrenaline if you affect another ally.

name: Inspiring Imagery

facts.description: Increased outgoing damage; stacks intensity.
Critical chance increased; stacks duration.

description: Throw an inspiring beacon to a target location. The beacon will explode after a short duration, granting boons to nearby allies. The beacon can be detonated early to heal allies and damage enemies.

name: Phantasmal Sharpshooter

facts.description: Damage and condition damage taken are increased; stacks intensity.

description: Phantasm. Create a phantasm that shoots a bullet at your target, stunning them.

name: Singularity Shot

facts.description: Nondamaging conditions currently on you are ineffective; stacks duration.

description: Shoot a bullet at a target location that explodes upon arrival, granting resistance and barrier to allies. A singularity lingers at the impact point.

name: Enervating Earth
description:
Dual Attack. Fire a quick shot that debilitates your target. 

If you have an air bullet, consume it to also inflict daze. If you have an earth bullet, consume it to also inflict bleeding on your target.

name: Balanced Strike
description: Chain. A balanced staff strike.

name: Snap Pull

facts.description: Damage and condition damage taken are increased; stacks intensity.

description: Quickly snap your staff to pull enemies in and make them vulnerable.

name: Frigid Flurry
description:
Fire a volley of icy bullets that inflict bleeding.

If you have an ice bullet, consume it to heal for each strike. If not, create an ice bullet.

name: Path to Victory

facts.description: Gain health every second; stacks duration.

description: Burst. Carve a path to victory, dealing damage to enemies in front of you while healing and granting regeneration to nearby allies.

name: Through the Heart

facts.description: Deals damage every second; stacks intensity.

description: Fire a piercing shot that inflicts bleeding.

name: Shattering Stone
description:
Fire a shot that shatters into multiple shards.

If you have an earth bullet, consume it to enhance your next few attacks to inflict bleeding. If not, create an earth bullet.

name: Soothing Splash
description: Shoot a bullet of water. Heal for each unique condition on the enemy.

name: Cunning Salvo

facts.description: Deals damage every second; stacks intensity.
Movement speed decreased by 50%; stacks duration.

description: Stealth Attack. Throw an axe that explodes when it hits a target, crippling nearby enemies. Gain initiative if you strike an enemy.

name: Burgeon
description: Chain. Slam your target.

name: Inspiring Whirl
description: Whirl your staff, damaging nearby enemies and inspiring allies.

name: Deathly Enervation

facts.description: Movement speed decreased by 66%; skill cooldown increased by 66%; stacks duration.

description: Chain. Fire an even wider piercing projectile that inflicts chill.

name: Essence of Animated Sand

facts.description: Increased outgoing damage; stacks intensity.
Increased outgoing damage; stacks intensity.
Increased outgoing damage; stacks intensity.

description:
Fire an arrow equipped with a payload that explodes enchanted sand on impact, granting barrier and might to allies.

Chain Reaction. The next short-bow skill in the radius will grant additional might to allies.

name: Energy Meld
description: Gain endurance.

name: Echoing Erosion
description:
Dual Attack. Bleed your foe with ice and stone.

If you have an ice bullet, consume it to heal yourself. If you have an earth bullet, consume it to grant yourself barrier.

name: Gormandize

facts.description: Damage and condition damage taken are increased; stacks intensity.
Movement speed decreased by 66%; skill cooldown increased by 66%; stacks duration.

description: Sacrifice health to inflict additional damage and conditions on all targets hit by the maelstrom.

name: Abstraction

facts.description: Endurance regeneration decreased by 50%. 50% of hits are Glancing Blows (50% damage). Stacks duration.

Next outgoing attack misses; stacks duration.

description: Detonate your beacon, debilitating enemies and bolstering allies.

name: Rampant Growth

facts.description: Imbued with vital energy. At 5 stacks you become a Force of Nature, growing enlarged, gaining stability, increasing your outgoing damage and healing, and recharging your mace skills.
Unable to move; stacks duration.

description:
Unleashed Ambush. Strike the ground with your mace, creating a cascade of verdant growth that immobilizes targets struck and heals nearby allies. Gain Nature's Strength if you hit an enemy.
This skill cannot activate Force of Nature.

name: Germinate
description: Chain. Strike with your mace.

name: Path to Victory

facts.description: Gain health every second; stacks duration.

description: Burst. Carve a path to victory, dealing damage to enemies in front of you while healing and granting regeneration to nearby allies.

name: Function Gyro
description:
Create a lightning field at your location, then summon gyros to finish foes and revive allies within the field.
Interrupted gyros are destroyed.

name: Zealot's Flame

facts.description: Burn nearby foes.
Deals damage every second; stacks intensity.

description: Set yourself alight, periodically burning up to three nearby foes. The final pulse applies additional burning.

name: Detonate Blossoming Aura
description: Detonate your Blossoming Aura manually.

name: Function Gyro
description:
Create a lightning field at the specified point, then summon gyros to finish foes and revive allies within the field.
Interrupted gyros are destroyed.

name: Icerazor's Ire
description: Legendary Renegade. Summon Visk Icerazor from the Mists to magically bombard your enemies with debilitating conditions.

name: Razorclaw's Rage
description: Legendary Renegade. Summon Centurion Jas Razorclaw from the Mists to strike nearby enemies and enhance the attacks of your allies.

name: Darkrazor's Daring
description:
Legendary Renegade. Summon Kus Darkrazor to disrupt your enemies.

Band Together. After using this skill, your next Legendary Renegade skill activates instantly and is enhanced. When this skill is enhanced it also grants resistance to nearby allies.

name: Carnivore
description: Steal health from a disabled foe.

name: Breakrazor's Bastion
description: Legendary Renegade. Summon Era Breakrazor to heal your allies while shielding them from condition damage.

name: Frightening Speed
description: In a blur of flashing blades, Kanaxai dashes from target to target, striking everything in his path, pausing briefly to perform a deadly spin. Does increased damage to secondary targets.

name: Tormenting Visions

facts.description: Deals damage every second. Deals additional damage to foes that aren't moving. Stacks intensity.
Deals damage every second. Deals additional damage to foes that aren't moving. Stacks intensity.

description: Send distressing thoughts to your enemy to torment them.

name: Vialgos's Toxin Pool
description: Caustic projectiles erupt from Vialgos, covering the ground and forming a pool of rot. Pools of rot will cause stacking damage over time.

name: Annihilate
description: Deimos slams its fists, creating a massive shockwave.

name: Rapid Decay
description: Deimos decomposes the ground beneath a target. For each target hit, the affected area rapidly increases in size.

name: Panopticon
description: Beast. Fire malignant magic at nearby enemies, corrupting boons on enemies it hits.

name: Staring Void

facts.description: Next outgoing attack misses; stacks duration.
Damage received on skill activation; stacks intensity.

description: Blast demonic energy in front of you, inflicting conditions on enemies it hits.

name: Entangling Asp

facts.description: Unable to move; stacks duration.
Deals damage every second; decreases healing effectiveness by 33%; damage stacks intensity.

description:
Follow Up. Poison your foe with a sweeping strike. Movement-impaired foes are immobilized.
Striking an enemy with a follow-up attack enables finisher attacks.

name: Maiming Spear

facts.description: Movement speed decreased by 50%; stacks duration.

description: Throw your spear at a targeted location, damaging and inflicting conditions on opponents in the area and causing an aftershock after a short delay. The aftershock deals more damage to the opponent closest to the epicenter.

name: Etching: Haboob

facts.description: Cannot be knocked down, pushed back, pulled, launched, stunned, dazed, floated, sunk, feared, or taunted.

description: Etch a spell into the ground that unleashes a devastating dust storm. Using a number of other skills within this etching completes the spell, unlocking its full potential.

name: Shattering Assault

facts.description: Currently invisible. Ends if you deal damage.

description: Finisher. Strike foes in front of you and remove boons from them, then enter stealth. Remove additional boons from weakened foes.

name: Earthen Spear

facts.description: Movement speed decreased by 50%; stacks duration.

description: Hurl a heavy earthen spear that cripples your foe.

name: Shale Storm
description: Dual Attack. Create a brief storm of whirling rocks that destroy incoming projectiles. Reduce the recharge of your primary attunement.

name: Stone Strike

facts.description: Deals damage every second; stacks intensity.

description: Toss a light spear of stone to bleed your foe.

name: Harrier's Toss

facts.description: Damage and condition damage taken are increased; stacks intensity.

description: Burst. Jump up and throw a spear at your targeted location, dealing damage in an area. Damage dealt is increased with adrenaline level, and the opponent closest to the epicenter takes additional damage.

name: Owl's Flight

facts.description: You cannot stealth
Movement speed decreased by 50%; stacks duration.

description: Stealth Attack. Reveal yourself and throw your spear. The spear is wider and unblockable, and it pierces.

name: Fiery Impact

facts.description: Cannot be knocked down, pushed back, pulled, launched, stunned, dazed, floated, sunk, feared, or taunted.

description: Dual Attack. Gain stability. Reduce the recharge of your primary attunement.

facts.description: Critical chance increased; stacks duration.

description: Etch a spell into the ground that summons an intense windstorm. Using a number of other skills within this etching completes the spell, unlocking its full potential.

name: Frostfire Ward

facts.description: Enveloped in a fiery shield that burns foes, grants might each time you are struck (1-second cooldown per attacker).
Chill foes that strike you (only once per second for each attacker); incoming damage is reduced by 10%.

description: Dual Attack. Gain fire and frost aura. Reduce the recharge of your primary attunement.

name: Bee's Sting
description: Ranged.Throw your spear.

name: Drake's Swipe
description: Chain. Swing your spear. If your enemy is far away, use Bee's Sting instead.

facts.description: Damage and condition damage taken are increased; stacks intensity.

Deals damage every second; decreases healing effectiveness by 33%; damage stacks intensity.

description: Stealth Attack. Attack foes in front of you with a series of strikes, making them vulnerable. The final strike inflicts damaging conditions. If this skill follows a Finisher skill, it grants initiative. Consumes all malice when striking your mark to inflict torment and increase the damage dealt.

name: Distracting Throw

facts.description: Movement speed decreased by 50%; stacks duration.
Damage and condition damage taken are increased; stacks intensity.
Increased outgoing damage.

description: Throw a spear that inflicts conditions on your target. If this strikes a movement-impaired foe, it also inflicts daze. If this skill follows a Finisher skill, it counts as a lead attack and grants a bonus to outgoing damage for a duration.

name: Falcon's Stoop

facts.description: Movement speed decreased by 50%; stacks duration.

description: Fling your spear at your enemy, dealing heavy damage. Damage is increased against immobilized, disabled, or defiant foes.

facts.description: Deals damage every second. Deals additional damage to foes that aren't moving. Stacks intensity.

description: Unleash a devastating dust storm that damages and debilitates enemies.

name: Helio Rush

facts.description: Incoming condition damage decreased by 33%; stacks duration.
Endurance regeneration decreased by 50%. 50% of hits are Glancing Blows (50% damage). Stacks duration.
Your next spear attack is illuminated.

description:
Charge forward with your spear, striking enemies and healing allies you pass through. Upon striking an enemy, your next spear attack is illuminated.
 
Illuminated. Allies you pass through are healed for more and gain boons. Enemies you strike take bonus damage and are inflicted with conditions.

  Allies at full health are not affected by this skill.

name: Puncturing Jab

facts.description: Deals damage every second; stacks intensity.

facts.description: Deals damage every second; decreases healing effectiveness by 33%; damage stacks intensity.

description: Unleash gravitational Mist forces on your targeted area that initially pulls foes toward the center. Abyssal Raze's cooldown is reduced for each target you attempt to pull.

name: Mental Collapse
description: Teleport to your target and release a cascade of psychic energy, damaging nearby enemies. Refresh your Mind the Gap skill. The initial impact stuns foes struck if you have Clarity.

name: Mighty Throw
description: Throw a spear at your enemy that shatters on contact, scattering shards that damage enemies around the initial target.

name: Disrupting Throw

facts.description: Unable to move; stacks duration.

description: Throw a spear that pierces foes in a line, immobilizing them. The first enemy struck by this skill is additionally dazed.

description: Traverse the area and unleash lighting around you, directly targeting focused foes a number of times.

Movement speed decreased by 66%; skill cooldown increased by 66%; stacks duration.

description:
Throw a spear at your target. If it strikes a foe, it inflicts conditions and you may reactivate to teleport to that foe. 
This skill recharges when exiting death shroud.

name: Soul Shards
description: Siphon life from targets struck by Perforate. Damage is increased against enemies below the health threshold, and healing is increased while you are below the health threshold.

name: Rending Strike

facts.description: Deals damage every second; stacks intensity.
Damage and condition damage taken are increased; stacks intensity.

description: Swing your spear, inflicting bleeding. Inflict vulnerability if your target is focused.

name: Mongoose's Frenzy

facts.description: Damage and condition damage taken are increased; stacks intensity.

description: Swipe at enemies in front of you, cleaving them.

name: Wyvern's Lash

facts.description: Movement speed decreased by 50%; stacks duration.

description: Chain. Strike with your spear, crippling your foe. If your enemy is far away, use Bee's Sting instead.

name: Distress

facts.description: Striking an enemy with Perforate siphons health from them.

description: Teleport to the foe marked by Isolate, recharge Perforate, and gain soul shards. Gain additional soul shards if there are no other enemies nearby.

name: Conduit Surge

facts.description: Deals damage every second; stacks intensity.
Deals damage every second; stacks intensity.
Spear skills have bonus effects against Focused targets.

description: Leap toward your target, unleashing intense energy on the area if you strike them. Your primary target becomes the focus of your other skills. If a focused target dies, this skill is refreshed.

name: Lightning Javelin

facts.description: Damage and condition damage taken are increased; stacks intensity.

description: Launch a spear of lightning that makes your foe vulnerable.

name: Symbol of Luminance

facts.description: Nondamaging conditions currently on you are ineffective; stacks duration.
Endurance regeneration decreased by 50%. 50% of hits are Glancing Blows (50% damage). Stacks duration.
All spear skills are illuminated while standing within the Symbol of Luminance.

description:
Places the Symbol of Luminance on the ground, knocking back enemies on initial cast. While active, the symbol grants boons to allies and inflicts conditions on enemies. While standing within the symbol, your spear attacks are automatically illuminated and do not consume the illuminated effect when used. Resistance granted by this skill can only be granted once per interval.

Illuminated. While the symbol is active, all other spear skills are illuminated, even if you move out of range of the symbol.

name: Seethe

facts.description: Increased outgoing damage; stacks intensity.
Critical chance increased; stacks duration.
Your next spear skill deals additional damage.

description: Gain boons. Your next spear skill deals increased damage.

name: Jkulhlaup
description: Invoke a glacial flood that damages enemies. Heal for each target struck.

name: Electric Artillery

facts.description: Deals damage every second; stacks intensity.
Unable to move; stacks duration.
Deals damage every second; stacks intensity.
Deals damage every second; stacks intensity.
Deals damage every second; stacks intensity.
Deals damage every second; stacks intensity.

prefix.description: Damage and condition damage taken are increased; stacks intensity.
Damage and condition damage taken are increased; stacks intensity.

description: Hurl your charged rod at a foe, immobilizing them. Foes take increased burning duration and vulnerability stacks based on your lightning rod's charge.

traited_facts.description: Damage and condition damage taken are increased; stacks intensity.

name: Barbed Spear

facts.description: Deals damage every second; stacks intensity.

description: Swing your spear. If your enemy is far away, throw your spear instead.

name: Undertow

facts.description: Skills and actions are slower.

description: Conjure a whirlpool at the target location, pulling enemies in. Enemies at the center of the whirlpool are slowed.

name: Blitz Mines

facts.description: Endurance regeneration decreased by 50%. 50% of hits are Glancing Blows (50% damage). Stacks duration.
Skills and actions are slower.
Movement speed decreased by 66%; skill cooldown increased by 66%; stacks duration.

description: Drop mines behind you as you dodge.

name: Predator's Ambush

facts.description: You cannot stealth

description: Stealth Attack. Leap to a target location, dazing enemies. Deal increased damage to foes below the health threshold.

name: Imaginary Inversion

facts.description: Evade all attacks.

description: Cleanse conditions and evade while preparing a strong attack. If you successfully evade, heal yourself. Healing is improved if you have Clarity.

name: Psycut

facts.description: Increased outgoing damage; stacks intensity.

description: Slash your spear in front of yourself. Gain might per target struck.

name: Missed Stroke
description: Paint stroke is sloppy.

name: Overcharged Conduit Blast
description: Scarlet slams her fists into the ground, releasing a wave of energy that applies torment to her enemies.

name: Battle Maul

facts.description: Movement speed decreased by 50%; stacks duration.

description: Pounce on foes.

name: Haunting Echo
description: Lextalion's mere presence causes a wave of spectral energy to wash over the area every 3 seconds.

name: Bop
description: Smack your foe to knock them down.

name: Stone Sweep

facts.description: Deals damage every second; stacks intensity.

description: Sweeping attack.

name: Wicked Swipe
description: Swipes the air, dealing damage at close range.

name: Stone Sweep
description: Sweeping attack.

name: Rallying Roar

facts.description: Movement speed is greatly increased. Maximum duration: 10s

description: Beast. Let out a noble roar, granting superspeed to nearby allies.

name: Spectral Impact

facts.description: Deals damage every second. Deals additional damage to foes that aren't moving. Stacks intensity.

description: Smashes the ground, dealing impact damage to foes in front and underneath.

name: Chorus of Thunder

facts.description: Decima will periodically consume stacks of this effect to target a number of nearby enemies with Chorus of Thunder.
Decima will periodically consumes stacks of this effect to target a number of conduits with Chorus of Thunder.

description:
Decima calls out to the storm, which responds with a thundering chorus. This consumes all stacks of Peal of Discord and Peal of Harmony.

Each stack of Peal of Discord lets Decima target the closest untargeted player with Chorus of Thunder.

Each stack of Peal of Harmony lets Decima target an uncharged conduit near the farthest player.

Thunderbolts deal increased damage to secondary targets in their area.

name: Seismic Crash
description:
Decima slams down, causing the immediate vicinity to erupt with jagged rocks and pyrite. The tremendous force sends enemies sliding away. Dodge rolling will end the slide prematurely. Deals increased damge to close targets.

Enemies that impact a conduit will take extra damage and ricochet in another direction.

name: Fluxlance Fusillade

facts.description:
Recent damage from Decima's fluxlance attacks has made you more vulnerable to dancing sparks.

When taking damage from a dancing spark, you will also take significant extra damage from Galvanic Sensitivity.

Galvanic Sensitivity removes Harmonic Sensitivity and prevents it from being applied for the duration.

description:
Decima fires several fluxlance beams at enemies in sequence. Conduits struck by a beam gain charge, but block the beam's path, allowing targets to take cover if needed.

Makes enemies vulnerable to dancing sparks.

name: Propel
description: Ura launches herself at the furthest target, dealing a high amount of damage when she lands.

name: Rain of Spores
description: The Greerling targets 3 players, preferring the farthest away, and then fires a torrent of exploding spores along a line that moves towards the initial position of the target. The spores explode on impact, inflicting damage, poison, and confusion.

name: Fulgent Aura
description: Charged conduits emit a dangerous aura of Arcane Flux that damages nearby enemies. The aura increases in size as the conduit gains more Charge.

name: Fulgent Fence
description: Decima periodically links two conduits together with a tether of arcane flux. Enemies entering the beam are damaged and pushed out. Enemies that are shoved into the beam by Decima's attacks are ejected at high speed.

name: Fluxlance Salvo
description:
Decima fires a salvo of fluxlance beams simultaneously. A conduit struck by a beam gains Charge, but blocks the beam's path, allowing targets to take cover if needed.

Makes enemies vulnerable to dancing sparks.

name: Fluxlance Salvo

facts.description:
Recent damage from Decima's fluxlance attacks has made you more vulnerable to dancing sparks.

When taking damage from a dancing spark, you will also take significant extra damage from Galvanic Sensitivity.

Galvanic Sensitivity removes Harmonic Sensitivity and prevents it from being applied for the duration.

description:
Decima fires a salvo of fluxlance beams simultaneously. A conduit struck by a beam gains Charge, but blocks the beam's path, allowing targets to take cover if needed.

Makes enemies vulnerable to dancing sparks.

name: Chorus of Thunder

facts.description: Decima will periodically consume stacks of this effect to target a number of nearby enemies with Chorus of Thunder.
Decima will periodically consumes stacks of this effect to target a number of conduits with Chorus of Thunder.

description:
Decima calls out to the storm, which responds with a thundering chorus. This consumes all stacks of Peal of Discord and Peal of Harmony.

Each stack of Peal of Discord lets Decima target the closest untargeted player with Chorus of Thunder.

Each stack of Peal of Harmony lets Decima target an uncharged conduit near the farthest player.

Thunderbolts deal increased damage to secondary targets in their area.

name: Stomp the Growth
description: Greer stomps 3 times in quick succession. The first two stomps hit all targets in a circle around the impact point, dealing damage, inflicting poison, and applying vulnerability. The third stomp creates a wave of corruption.

name: Steam Prison
description: Creates a steam prison that prevents escape and reflects projectiles.

name: Fluxlance Salvo

facts.description:
Recent damage from Decima's fluxlance attacks has made you more vulnerable to dancing sparks.

When taking damage from a dancing spark, you will also take significant extra damage from Galvanic Sensitivity.

Galvanic Sensitivity removes Harmonic Sensitivity and prevents it from being applied for the duration.

description:
Decima fires a salvo of fluxlance beams simultaneously. A conduit struck by a beam gains Charge, but blocks the beam's path, allowing targets to take cover if needed.

Makes enemies vulnerable to dancing sparks.

name: Focused Fluxlance
description:
Decima targets a conduit with a focused fluxlance attack. The beam charges the targeted conduit unless the indicated number of players stand in the beam to absorb it. 

Does not trigger extra damage from Harmonic Sensitivity.

name: Fluxlance Salvo

facts.description:
Recent damage from Decima's fluxlance attacks has made you more vulnerable to dancing sparks.

When taking damage from a dancing spark, you will also take significant extra damage from Galvanic Sensitivity.

Galvanic Sensitivity removes Harmonic Sensitivity and prevents it from being applied for the duration.

description:
Decima fires a salvo of fluxlance beams simultaneously. A conduit struck by a beam gains Charge, but blocks the beam's path, allowing targets to take cover if needed.

Makes enemies vulnerable to dancing sparks.

name: Discordant Thunder
description:
Decima calls out to the storm, and the storm responds with a thundering chorus.

A number of players closest to Decima are targeted with bolts of Discordant Thunder. If a bolt's area of effect strikes a conduit, it gains some charge.

name: Mainshock

facts.description: Damage and condition damage taken are increased; stacks intensity.

description: Decima slams an orb of arcane flux into the ground, causing a cascade of ruptures to form around her. The ground heaves with enough force to shatter bones and cripple her enemies.

name: Cage of Decay
description: Rot cages create several outward-rippling cascades of rot walls around a zone of noxious blight. The last set of rot walls stay in place for the duration of the noxious blight, damaging, bleeding, and knocking back foes and blocking projectiles that hit them.

name: Flux Nova
description:
Decima gathers a colossal amount of arcane flux into an unstable orb. After several seconds, she detonates this orb to obliterate her enemies.

If Decima reaches full charge while channeling this skill, it ends early, and the damage becomes unsurvivable.
